name: Robin & Wren Bath time
description:
A cute and colourful children's picture book featuring the lovable characters Robin and Wren. Robin has been making mud pies - and now he needs a bath. 

Full Colour Hardcover: 32 pages 
Product Dimensions: 20.6 x 20.6 x 0.8 cm 
Language English 
ISBN-13: 978-0956329004 

"Fantastic book for the kids. So funny! My 5 year old can read it as the print is bold and simple words, my 2 year old is enjoying her big brother reading to her and laughing together! A MUST HAVE BUY FOR ANY KIDS BOOKSHELF!!! "

www.robinandwren.co.uk
